website_summaries.verdict: Long vertical strings and bright lights make this set a consistent favorite.
pros: 9' strings can be connected to more sets and controlled by one remote
Has 8 light modes – combination, wave, sequence, slow, chase, slow down, flashing, and steady
Long strings cover an extended vertical space
cons: Some sets contain strings of lights that don't work

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and so do I!!!! I even put some up in my room!!
customer_reviews.author: jermainne t ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Curtain lights
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loved these lights! We used them for a tent for my daughter's Sweet 16th Birthday, Under the Stars .
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and looked wonderful. Received many complements for our recent event
customer_reviews.author: Gary Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, you won’t regret
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product more than half a year ago and used it intensively (every evening approximately for 5-6h). It works just great and size was perfect for my dining wall. Lights didn’t fade nor stop working. In case you ever have a problem with one of the lights sellers include one extra light into a box which can be easily replaced. Previously, I used different brand of similar lights but stopped using this because of two reasons: - lights heat up - energy bill increased I’ve beed so lucky to find this product because it doesn’t have any of these problems and makes me smile :)
customer_reviews.author: Tkalenko Svitlana

customer_reviews.title: These lights were amazing! lit up my party so well and all ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights were amazing! lit up my party so well and all my guests squeezed in to take pictures constantly! The lights were just as bright as in the picture. Took some time to unravel, but if you take our time carefully, the turnout is great. If you don't have the patience to put this up, then I would suggest not buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Chong

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think I would love these as much as i do. My husband built me a small canopy above the bed, and we put these behind it. Be careful, they are a pain in the butt to open and get straight.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great for adding atmosphere as well as a little light. I did a corner on our porch and love them. My only caution is if you have spaces between the boards on your porch floor (ours does) make sure you hang them high enough the lights don't get caught in those cracks. I recommend these and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Howtypical

customer_reviews.title: that they work for more than a month??
customer_reviews.text: I did love the lights, we use them in a Gazebo for weddings, but only had them up for a month and they stoped working, found out if I played with the plug they would come on and off, there is a loose wire inside and nothing I can do about it. After having them for a while there was no option to return and get another set. Now I have to decide it I want to spend the money again and see if the next set has a loose wire :(
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fragile but great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights but becareful untangle when get them out of the package because I broke one and I was very upset but I qas able to split the plastic and connected together.... it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lights
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! We used this in a backdrop for my friends baby shower. All the lights worked and they were nicely wrapped up and easy to unravel. She kept this set. I’ll probably buy another set for myself to keep!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Word

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 7yr old girl’s room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 7yr old girl’s room! We simply hung them over the existing curtain rod and I wrapped them around the ends to stay in place. The lights remain cool to touch. The white light creates a nice relaxing atmosphere. The pic shows them on only in the bedroom along with a strand of paper star lights from Target.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and bright!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Super bright and long lasting. I’ve had them outside for several months now and they are just as bright as they were when I first put them Outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re pretty cool, just wish it had an actual remote.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these lights, though I’ve only had them for 2 days now. The biggest thing is that it doesn’t allow dimming and also doesn’t come with an actual remote control. There’s a small button on the outlet box that you press to control the settings. I don’t mind it that much anymore but I was thoroughly confused at first. They’re really long, which is good, and they’re bright. Also good, but I would like to dim them a bit in the future. Easy to install? Eh. Took me an hour but I was on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Constant slight flicker even when set to still motion which gives me a headache
customer_reviews.text: So I bought these twice. The first time I loved them so much I had to buy a second set. But once the second set came I noticed they have a constant slight flicker to them when they are set on still mode. They shouldn’t slightly flicker at all on still mode. My other ones are set to still and don’t flicker. This second set does and gives me a headache. If this set wasn’t messed up I would have given these 5 stars. I never received a remote with either of them though, but I’m not worried about that.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Platt

customer_reviews.title: I see STARS
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! We got them for my sons room to add some character and double as a nightlight. These are some brite white LEDs - we probably should've gone with the warm option. However, we purchased curtians for his room with moons and stars on them - put the lights behind the curtain and it lights up all the stars. It's very cool and not to bright 😊
customer_reviews.author: Elise DeMaranville

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. Packaged nicely, easy to use. I wish they had a twinkle setting, but they are still great.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Romance
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these lights. My preference is the white lights. It makes the room look cold, yet romantic. I made a mistake of undoing all the strings first, then trying to untangle them. I would suggest hanging your lights first. You don’t need any extra light with these. My room is bright, but enough not to light it up too much at night. Will have to turn them off at night. Glad I found them! Just ordered more for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Tsitsishvili

customer_reviews.title: GET THIS
customer_reviews.text: So so so beautiful. I ordered white and it lights the whole living room with a soft light that is not going to bother at all. Looks really delicate, was easy to install (I used some 3M hooks) lightweight and the different modes work great.
customer_reviews.author: Alondra Maldonado Rosado

customer_reviews.title: The description is right on.
customer_reviews.text: The different settings are awesome. These are gorgeous, I'm super happy about this purchase. Its exactly what it looks like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: These are Stunning! Way bigger than my space but I double backed on them and its beautiful. Keeping them up year round. Love when they are the only light in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found this product here.
customer_reviews.text: Used it around my window display at Christmas. Won best window.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Dliuz ul safe 304 led 9.8 ft White lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. They are super bright, and they are longer than I thought. I can't wait to take Christmas pictures in front of them, with my family, and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Toni austin

customer_reviews.title: Look beautiful... Leaving them up all year!
customer_reviews.text: Many compliments on these! They look beautiful in my doorways to patio... Will be leaving them up all year!! Just wish I would have gotten them with remote.. Next time!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just string lights-nothing special-sheer not included
customer_reviews.text: This makes it appear these are more than string lights. They come in a box and you unravel them and string them to whatever you want. I am sure you can get cheaper at a dollar store as there isn't anything special here.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Barber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lights
customer_reviews.text: Love this curtain, it is definitely bright. The only issue is the second to last strand is the link, leaving a bit of a gap on the end. Still, it’s a great value and we plan to add a sheer curtain to dim the light a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Blount

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The lights are great! Used them for a snow-scape for Christmas and they were amazing! Really long, really tall. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: RaShonda

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful at night and different settings for the light very long though and wide we used it under Neath the deck for a nice atmosphere and it really did give it best that
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Cool lights
customer_reviews.text: I hung them with command strips. They have it packed perfect so you just hang, snip the tie and let them drop. I had to use an extension cord, but that’s ok they are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights.
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights they are pretty easy to hang it took a little more time than we expected but these are great for parties or just to hang in your room.
customer_reviews.author: Star Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful. Nice clean white light. No lamp for the cats to knock over. Take a bit of time to arrange them in a straight main line. Don’t take off the bands until you have the main line hung up. The rest is easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful with Sheer Curtains
customer_reviews.text: I paired mine with some sheer curtains for my archway between my dining room and living room as part of my Xmas decorations. They were packaged well and I did NO untangling. It's nice how the plug part of the wire is very long so there was NO need for an extension cord for me. They're perfectly bright but not as blue-colored as the picture shows. They're definitely a cool white.
customer_reviews.author: Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: These are so bright. Ive had them up in my room for about a week now and they still work well. The several different modes are awesome. There is a weird smell on the product but once they are hung you cant smell it, it just gets on your hands when you touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for events and even simple room decor!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the wedding decorations, these were the ones most talked about! Definitely made the ambiance more majestic
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: VERY bright, but smelly
customer_reviews.text: The lights are lovely, and VERY bright. The power cord/box gets very hot when plugged in. The lights have a very strong and unpleasant smell of what I can only best describe as plastic.
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m not very happy!!!! I just put these up as part of my Christmas lights and half of the curtain only has half the lights working. They shouldn’t be burnt out or anything wrong with them this quick and the first time using them.
customer_reviews.author: Becky B.

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to entangle
customer_reviews.text: I can only say you have to have more than one to entangle these lights. After spending so much time I got so frustrated
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: Great money value highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love it I'm actually planning to buy more there is no remote control you have to control it from the cord but other than that I highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Bright enough.
customer_reviews.text: I like these Christmas lights, especially because you can connect multiple strings and they are suitable for indoor or outdoor use. I put them in my lounge and I don't want to take them down after using them at night. There are 8 settings for the lights, you can use the controller to increase or decrease the brightness of the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Schenk

customer_reviews.title: They are a nightmare nightmare to keep untangled!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this behind some silk and tulle for a wedding backdrop. They all light fine, but it didn't come with a remote.
customer_reviews.author: Hurstclan

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  4 out of 10 sets not working on second use, SHORT return window!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 10 sets of these lights for a wedding. After connecting them together, one of them stopped working immediately. The return time was 30 days and we missed it. Then when it was time for the wedding 3 more sets did not work. Very disappointing. All of the other curtain lights we purchased worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 sets, beginning was slow, once started got the hang of it, and it went well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Used these as a photo backdrop for an Enchanted Forest Prom and they were perfect. They can tangle easily, so watch when unwrapping them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect behind my daughters curtains!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and perfect for behind my daughters curtains! Fast shipping too!

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing!!! So worth the money we leave them on 24/7 they don’t get hot and they have different modes to do different things I highly recommend these I’ve had mike over a year and Still going strong 💪🏼 no glitches no bulbs out this is well worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!

customer_reviews.title: Bright and pretty

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.

product_meta.title: DLIUZ UL Safe 304 LED 9.8FT Linkable Curtain Lights Icicle Lights Fairy String Lights with 8 Modes for Christmas Wedding Party Family Patio Lawn Decoration (White)
feature_bullets: 8 DIFFERENT LIGHT MODES: Combination, Wave, Sequence, Slow, Chase / Flash, Slow Down, Flashing / Flashing, and Steady Light. With just one button you can control different lighting effects.

CONNECTABLE/ LINKABLE: The DLIUZ curtain fairy lights can be connected multiple sets together, it can be controlled by the one controller after connected. (Note: We suggest that 2-3 sets connected together, otherwise, it will affect the brightness and color of the whole lights.)

29V UL LISTED, SAFE TO USE: This Curtain fairy light total have 304LED small lamps each set, unfold size is 9.8ft x 9.8ft (Length x Width) direct output 29V (safety voltage), UL certified, so that the lamps can be safer than the regular version.
WATERPROOF: The wires and lamps are IP44 waterproof, it can use outdoor or indoor, but the controller and plug are not, you need to do some protection
WIDELY USE OCCASIONS: Parties, weddings, home, windows, bathrooms, performances, restaurants, hotels, vacations, commercial buildings, shopping malls, Christmas tree etc.
